title: Framed Hardstone Panel
description: Framed Hardstone Panel; Unknown; Florence, Tuscany, Italy; about 1970; hardware and ancient stone 17th century; Frames: ebony; Panels: Alabaster egiziano onix melleus in the center surrounded by (clockwise from the top) lapis lazuli, verde di Corsica marble, amethyst, verde antico marble, pietra paesina, breccia verde d'Egitto lapis hecatontalithos, semesanto marble, and porphyry verde d'Egitto; 77.5 cm (30 1/2 in.); 95.SE.57.4; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
